import React,{useState,useEffect,useRef}from"react";import"../components/ChatApp.css";// ‚úÖ Correct path import bgImage from"../assets/chatbot-bg.jpg";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chatbot-container",style:{backgroundImage:`url(${bgImage})`,backgroundSize:"cover",backgroundPosition:"center"}});function Chatbot(){const[messages,setMessages]=useState([{text:"Hello! Enter ingredients to get recipes.",sender:"bot"}]);const[input,setInput]=useState("");const[showExtraButtons,setShowExtraButtons]=useState(false);const chatBoxRef=useRef(null);const inputRef=useRef(null);// ‚úÖ Auto-scroll to latest message useEffect(()=>{if(chatBoxRef.current){chatBoxRef.current.scrollTop=chatBoxRef.current.scrollHeight;}},[messages]);// ‚úÖ Send message when Enter is pressed useEffect(()=>{const handleKeyPress=event=>{if(event.key==="Enter"){event.preventDefault();sendMessage();}};const inputElement=inputRef.current;if(inputElement){inputElement.addEventListener("keypress",handleKeyPress);}return()=>{if(inputElement){inputElement.removeEventListener("keypress",handleKeyPress);}};},[]);// ‚úÖ Function to send ingredients and get matching recipes const sendMessage=async()=>{if(!input.trim())return;const userMessage={text:input,sender:"user"};setMessages(prev=>[...prev,userMessage]);try{const response=await fetch("http://127.0.0.1:5000/get_recipes",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({ingredients:input})});const data=await response.json();if(data.response){const formattedResponse=data.response.replace(/\n/g,"
").replace(/\*\*(.*?)\*\*/g,"$1");setMessages(prev=>[...prev,{text:formattedResponse,sender:"bot",isHTML:true}]);}else{setMessages(prev=>[...prev,{text:"‚ö†Ô∏è No recipes found!",sender:"bot"}]);}}catch(error){setMessages(prev=>[...prev,{text:"‚ùå Sorry, there was an error processing your request.",sender:"bot"}]);console.error("Error fetching recipes:",error);}setInput("");};// ‚úÖ Fetch a single random recipe const getRandomRecipe=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("http://127.0.0.1:5000/random-recipe");const data=await response.json();if(data.response){const formattedResponse=data.response.replace(/\n/g,"
").replace(/\*\*(.*?)\*\*/g,"$1");setMessages(prev=>[...prev,{text:formattedResponse,sender:"bot",isHTML:true}]);}else{setMessages(prev=>[...prev,{text:"‚ùå No random recipe found.",sender:"bot"}]);}}catch(error){setMessages(prev=>[...prev,{text:"‚ùå Error fetching random recipe.",sender:"bot"}]);console.error("Error fetching random recipe:",error);}};// ‚úÖ Fetch 3 random recipes const getThreeRandomRecipes=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("http://127.0.0.1:5000/three-random-recipes");const data=await response.json();if(data.response){const formattedResponse=data.response.replace(/\n/g,"
").replace(/\*\*(.*?)\*\*/g,"$1");setMessages(prev=>[...prev,{text:formattedResponse,sender:"bot",isHTML:true}]);}else{setMessages(prev=>[...prev,{text:"‚ùå No random recipes found.",sender:"bot"}]);}}catch(error){setMessages(prev=>[...prev,{text:"‚ùå Error fetching random recipes.",sender:"bot"}]);console.error("Error fetching random recipes:",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chatbot-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chat-box",ref:chatBoxRef,children:messages.map((msg,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`message ${msg.sender}`,children:msg.isHTML?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:msg.text}}):msg.text},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:input,ref:inputRef// ‚úÖ Added ref for Enter key listener ,onChange:e=>setInput(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter ingredients..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:sendMessage,children:"Send"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"plus-button",onClick:()=>setShowExtraButtons(!showExtraButtons),children:"+"}),showExtraButtons&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"extra-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:getRandomRecipe,className:"random-recipe-btn",children:"\uD83C\uDFB2 Random Recipe"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:getThreeRandomRecipes,className:"three-random-btn",children:" \uD83D\uDD25Top 3 Trending Recipes"})]})]})]})});}export default Chatbot;
